line_1: May sprightly Health, with rosy lip
line_2: Light round thy paths may Pleasure trip,

line_1: But being tied, it dies upon the lip,
line_2: Faint as a chicken's note that has the pip:

line_1: Whoe'er un'wares shall ply his thirsty lip,
line_2: Shall hapless from the cup delusion sip,

line_1: From the cold reluctant lip!
line_2: Forcing accents, mutter'd deep,

line_1: Close no more thy pallid lip,
line_2: Shall no more thy sunk eye steep,

line_1: The fragrance of thy balmy lip!
line_2: Nor let the blasting spoiler sip.

line_1: Where moon-ey'd IDIOCY, with fallen lip,
line_2: Drags the loose knee, and intermitting step.

line_1: The unhonoured beverage with contemptuous lip,
line_2: And what the changeful fleeting crowd, who sip

line_1: Sweet as nectar to my lip.
line_2: Which the sportive muses sip,

line_1: The balmy Pleasure of the Shepherd's Lip.
line_2: Who, mindless of the Feasting, went to sip

line_1: Oh! where is the sweetness that dwells on that lip?
line_2: No sweet dew of love from these roses I sip,

line_1: And pouted with the prettiest purple Lip —
line_2: Taught the light Foot a modish little Trip,

line_1: Each leaf, whose fragrant steam with ruby lip
line_2: Gay China's nymphs from pictur'd vases sip;

line_1: Do thou, if Lethe court thy lip,
line_2: Still in thy soul his image keep,

line_1: And purple Health her rosy lip.
line_2: And Chastity her matron step,

line_1: The pouting, or the smiling lip,
line_2: Whether those eyes look kind or weep,

line_1: And lip in rapture glued to lip;
line_2: Imagination's sweets we sip.

line_1: She turn'd it from my eager lip.
line_2: Ere I the magic draught could sip;

line_1: Handing the cup to Hope's sweet lip,
line_2: Of which we guests so fondly sip,

line_1: And suck sweet poison from thy velvet lip,
line_2: Taught from thy sparkling cup full joys to sip,

line_1: Then, with sweet pressure of her rosy lip,
line_2: The thrilling joy he would for ever sip,

line_1: A placid smile plays o'er each roseate lip,
line_2: That slumbering thus unconscious she may sip

line_1: With eager eye and smacking lip:
